sentences.en: Among the four objectives of macroeconomic control, land control has bright prospect.
sentences.cn: 在宏观调控的四大目标中, 土地调控大有可为.

sentences.en: But despite all this turmoil, it has found some macroeconomic steel.
sentences.cn: 但是尽管有这些骚乱, 巴基斯坦宏观经济却收获了稳定.

sentences.en: But macroeconomic fundamentals are much healthier in East Asia these days.
sentences.cn: 但是东亚的宏观经济状况现在要健康得多.

sentences.en: But, the key thing is that whatever the authorities do, what we think would support the rating would be greater macroeconomic stability.
sentences.cn: 但关键问题是无论当局做什么，我们认为能够支持信用评级的将是宏观经济的进一步稳定。

sentences.en: Compiling, updating and reviewing statistical data in commodities balance sheets, macroeconomic monitoring.
sentences.cn: 收集, 更新以及评审商品平衡表和宏观经济监测.

sentences.en: Exchange rate problem always as a hot topic in the macroeconomic field.
sentences.cn: 有关汇率的研究问题一直是宏观经济领域的热点问题.

sentences.en: From the traditional economic theory, the capital markets and macroeconomic are good.
sentences.cn: 从传统经济理论上看, 这对资本市场乃至宏观经济都是利好.

sentences.en: Guosen Securities senior macroeconomic analyst Lin Song Li said.
sentences.cn: 国信证券资深宏观分析师林松立说.

sentences.en: If macroeconomic theory is to be of any use at all, it must include an explanation for unemployment.
sentences.cn: 如果宏观经济理论要想有所助益的话，就必须包含一个对失业问题的解释。

sentences.en: Improve the modern market system and tighten and improve macroeconomic control.
sentences.cn: (五)健全现代市场体系,加强和完善宏观调控.

sentences.en: May macroeconomic data of interest rate also squarely face what reason?
sentences.cn: 直面五月宏观数据加息还需要什么理由?

sentences.en: The bank also collects and disseminates information on macroeconomic topics and international monetary affairs.
sentences.cn: 银行还收集和传播关于宏观经济论题和国际货币事务方面的信息.

sentences.en: The macroeconomic forces that drove the capital flows were hard to reverse.
sentences.cn: 推动资本流动的宏观力量难以逆转.

sentences.en: The microeconomic and macroeconomic fluctuations might effect the loan.
sentences.cn: 微观和宏观经济的波动也许会影响贷款的归还.

sentences.en: The subject can be spilt in the usual way into macroeconomic and microeconomic topics.
sentences.cn: 这一学科通常可分为宏观经济和微观经济两大课题.

sentences.en: This may sound like buck - passing by the world's main international macroeconomic organisation.
sentences.cn: 这听起来好像是世界上主要的宏观经济国际组织在推托责任.

sentences.en: We will continue to strengthen and improve macroeconomic regulation.
sentences.cn: 坚持加强和改善宏观调控.

phrases.tran_cn: 宏观经济政策；总体经济政策
